lead_paragraph: A family video-watching scene is on the cover of the 2002 catalog from Movies Unlimited, a Philadelphia chain and mail-order house. Grandma is in charge of the remote control, and videocassettes and DVD's are scattered on the floor. Cassettes outnumber discs 4 to 3, the sign of a video scene in flux. This week Universal announced that about three million DVD's of ''Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas'' were sold in six days after its release on Nov. 20, in addition to 5.5 million cassettes.

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: DR SEUSS' HOW THE GRINCH STOLE CHRISTMAS (MOVIE)
